description: Cross-Country Ski trails in Wolfeboro, NH  Groomed trails created by the Wolfeboro Cross Country Ski Association (www.wolfeboroXC.org)Trail Pass is required and can be purchased in Down Town Wolfeboro at Nordic Skiers Sports.Trail maps have easy, more difficult, and most difficult trails as well as ungroomed.  The trails are well defined on the map and well marked at the trail intersections.
directions: In downtown Wolfeboro head northwest and then left on to Sewall Road follow the XC ski signs and right on Pleasant Street, then left onto Clow Road.  Parking is on the right and the warming hut is visible here.  See the trail maps at the web site above for a second parking lot for advanced trails.
title: Wolfeboro XC Ski Trails
